It gives them a faster path to global market. It gives them a role to leading devices. It allows them to focus on areas where they can differentiate. Though a finished agreement is still pending, Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer joined Stephen Elop on stage to affirm Microsoft's commitment to the partnership. She went on live television and drank vodka. The actress appeared on the` Late Show With David Letterman ' on Wednesday. David Letterman asked her what Betty White 's hobbies are now. David Letterman asked her, What do you like to do in your free time. She replied,`` Oh I like to do most anything, play with animals mostly and uh Vodka is kind of a hobby. And as if the moment couldn't get any more scripted, David Letterman pulled out two glasses with ice and vodka. Betty White drank out of the cup as David Letterman drank out of the bottle.
